I hate this game. The constant tunneling, the camping, the "meta" perks that make games unfun to play, the shitty teammates: those that hide, those that just run around, those that do literally anything other than the objective. With that said, Dead by Daylight is one of my favorite games.

Licensing issues mean that content is now starting to be removed from the game (characters and maps) as those licenses expire.

The balance is a bit of a shit show with low-skill-level survivors generally losing the majority of games and high-skill-level survivors winning the vast majority of games when compared with killers of equivalent skill.

The single game-mode available gets very repetitive over time.

The game has been a buggy mess since launch and seemingly gets worse instead of better as the developer prioritizes new content, which is also buggy.

The community tends to be extremely toxic.

There are lots of microtransactions for cosmetics.

The developer also has a history of mistreating QA staff.

Опаа. Хаай. Короче пофармил я эту игру. Ну и не игра это в принципе. Это так, прикол. По киберспорту я в эту хуету не играл, но ранг у меня скакал между 4 и 3. Возможно мне повезло. Возможно я долбаёб. Возможно вы долбаёб, но факт есть факт. Скажу сразу. В тиме играть НАМНОГО легче, так-что если хотите поиграть, то лучше зовите друга, но у меня друзей нет, поэтому я играл в основном в соло. Почему в основном? Да потому-что в эту хуйни никто из моих знакомых играть не хотел. Если вы не умете или не хотите учиться мансить, то ниже 8 ваш ранг не опуститься. Да и нахуй оно вам на самом деле и не надо. Ибо на красных рангах сидят в основном кемперы, которые тунелят тебя шо пиздец. И на самом деле я их понимаю. Потому-что иной раз против сыгранной тимы и мансеров ты ничего не сделаешь. Разве что на Нюрсе, но это другое. И на самом деле тут стоит провести черту. Потому-что соло чел который только зашёл в игру и сыгранная тима со связью и мансерами видят игру СОВСЕМ по разному. И если тима мансеров способна загенрашить мана буквально за 5 минут, у меня такое кста было. То новенького чела иной раз могут так отсечь в пердачело, что треск будет стоять. И это подводит нас к самой большой проблеме в игре. Баланс

Баланса в игре на сам-то деле не особо много. С одно стороны у нас сурвы. У которых понерфленны такие способности как осколок, бесполезные мины (привет резидент ивел) и кауча разного но главное бесполезного говна. И вот с другой стороны у нас маньяк. У которо есть такие скилы как: Розыгрыш, который запрещает прыгать в окно сурвам, после того как вы его перелезли. Или например ваншот после починки всех геников (не помню как называется, помню что это порча тотемная). Ну или мэйби тот же Майерс который пол игры стакается, а потом ходит и ваншотит. Этого долбаёбика хоть занерфили и его можно на изи загенрашить, хотя с рандомами это всё равно бывает сложно. И вот после такой хуйни как новому в игре челику играть? У которо нет ни тимы, который ещё не умеет мансить и т.д.
А потом идёт пиздеть на разраба типа "А чё бля, агде баланс то ыыы" Прямо как я сейчас хи-хик.
А хули им ещё делать то блять? Ну нельзя забалансить челов, которые на скиле ебут маньяков. Вот они и выпускают таких сильных ёбиков. 

Короче игра не плохая, но говном чуть-чуть воняет. Оценю я её на 7 из 10. На этом всё. Идите нахуй.

DEAD BY DAYLIGHT
-----------------------------------------

Alright so this is a pretty solid game for what its going for, it has good mechanics and makes it fair for the killer and survivors if the killer may be at a slight disadvantage

Dead By Daylight is what id consider a team based strategy game, Its more referred to a Survival horror game, the game has few qualities that turn it into a sort of chase like cat and mouse, or rivalries in cartoons but a tad bit more bloody.
I think its safe to say that Dead By Daylight is some of the "good games" with it being far more balanced than some games do this, this is probably one of my favored "horror" games and is known to be a good horror game in general.
Anyways, There are 2 opposing sides
Killers.
And Survivors.
You can pick which ones you rather want to play.
This is a 4 vs 1.

KILLERS
-------------------------

The Killer has many "physical" advantages for example being faster than a normal survivor, heightened senses, special abilities, and SUPER GOSH DARN INSANELY STRONG, LIKE APPARENTLY YOU CAN LIFT AN ENTIRE PERSON WITH EASE! But that doesn't matter. The Killer spawns alone in the map with nothing else to help them, unless if you use the environment to your advantage, like pallets or windows being vaulted, and cutting corners to catch survivors by surprise. but anyways lets not forget Blood-lust.

Blood-lust is basically the killers URGE TO MURDER MUAHAHAHAH- *cough-, anyways, its their urge to kill so  the longer your in a chase the faster you go overtime, there are three stages, so if the survivor is looping you, u get faster >:), now time to kill.

Anyways the killer may seem overpowered at first but that's basically where it ends. I haven't played it much but that's what I have.
But anyways, Killers and Survivors have perks, add-ons, and offerings to help them in the trail, killers have abilities and not items like the Survivors.


SURVIVORS
---------------------------
Survivors are victims pulled into the "realm" that require teamwork and numbers to win, the survivors start off with four players in the trail, you are going to have to go around the map not getting caught (obviously) and repair Generators as fast as possible to reach the goal to escape.

They don't have many advantages that are physical against the killer but will usually have items such as, maps to help find generators, flashlight NOT to light things up but rather blind the killer for a short time, tool boxes to more quickly repair generators, and saboteur Hooks
and a med-kit to obviously heal yourself.

there are also ways to confuse the Killer, for example hiding in a dark area after vaulting so the Killer wont know where you are, or dodge my spinning but more commonly referred to as 360's.
 hiding in general is also good, for example, when the killer walks away from a hooked survivor, you will have a chance to save and run away quickly.




POSITIVES
--------------------------
-Super fun with friends
-does a well job with communicating without speaking
-leaves room for co-operation 
-somewhat more satisfying than other games when winning
-free in-game currency for 3 different things (leveling up, characters, skins)
-good way to pass time
-Balanced game in general
-Super fun when you win
-Feels awesome
-Customizability with Key-binds (like every good game should have)

NEUTRAL
--------------------------
-decently high in suspense
-survivors are almost re-skins of others
-looping and chases can be suspenseful and quite annoying
-needing to pay for new characters
-glitches (but not crazy glitches)
-long matchmaking
-weird descriptions with some things
-not great matchmaking decisions 
-pretty dark if you don't have a bright Monitor

NEGATIVES
--------------------------
---BEWARE THE TOXIC PLAYERS---
they are everywhere
-So many bugs that required to be fixed/devs only focus on adding more content instead of patching 
-little to nothing perks and add-ons, unless if you can say they can be useful WITH EVIDENCE
-pretty repetitive
-can be annoying at times
-really overpowered strategies 
-overpowered perks or killers

EXTRAS
--------------------------
-Amazing audio design, i love how every sound in the game plays out, it brings all of the aspects of environment, other players, ambiance, effects, and event music. Just amazing, it all mixes together amazingly well and i cant say nothing less.
-Actually brings horror. Same with audio, it mixes almost everything perfectly if not all, breathing, heartbeats, walking, big stomps and screams in the distance, terrifying themes, crows, and even more. It truly mastered the horror subject.
-Graphics are good but not the best. the reason i say that is i see some texture oddities in some maps and characters. besides that its pretty good.
-There is no story mode whatsoever but there is TONS of lore scattered or clumped all around the game.


And that's it with my review! this game needs many improvements that could make it TONS and loads more fun, but in general its an okay game, its fun but repetitive. my only major complaint is repetitive and meaningless perks, add-ons, and major bugs, maybe add a few new modes here and there too.

 if you find this game interesting i'm sure it may be fun for you :D! See you in the trail >:) MUAHAHA- wait... oh well i'm probably not evil or anything

Довольно интересный проект от Behaviour Digital Inc. Первый в своем роде. Начну пожалуй с плюсов игры:
1. Атмосфера, музыкальное составляющее, жуткие звуки, мрачные локации; все это держит игрока в напряжении. Даже отыграв в эту игру более 500 часов, я получаю порцию адреналина заходя поиграть в данный онлайн хоррор.
2. Персонажи. Я сейчас буду говорить исключительно о маньяках, так как они являются украшением игры. Все как на подбор, жуткие твари, проработанные до мельчайших подробностей, а это дыхание в меню при выборе персонажа (особенно у "медсестры"). Все они жуткие, и если они гонятся за вами, это вызывает непередаваемые эмоции.

Playing as a killer? Worst Balanced game in existence and the Devs don't care, They just sell you more bandaid fixes in the form of paid DLC that you have to play days of the game to even unlock those fixes, there is no build variety, everyone just picks the same bandaid perks to make this game actually playable, try anything outside of the meta and you are just making the game harder for yourself, and god forbid you DON'T have the meta perks, cause then you end up in scenarios where all four survivors just rush you to unhook someone that you can even knock back down, cause of a perk, then they all speed away, because of a perk, all heal that injured survivor, you finally down someone again, but oophs, you were surrounded by survivors and blinded, or they body block the hook, or your hits, then speed away, heal, and come right back to do it all over again. This game is the definition of insanity, would i recommend this to anyone i remotely care about? no, am I still gonna keep playing it just for the very few moments where you don't get a team that's been playing for years and can actually have fun? Nope! Uninstalled :) Life is better now.

Questo gioco è na merda liquida, hai presente quando magni dal kebabbaro messicano che ti fa il kebab con la cipolla e salsa piccante e ti viene da cagare a spruzzo manco vedessi le visual che fa capobastone? ecco, quello è il gioco.
Apparte gli scherzi, il gioco in se è carino, il fatto che ci siano 4 persone che devono scappare e anche le varie collaborazioni con i film horror o serie di giochi è una cosa fantastica ma cazzo avvii una partita e trovi ps4 player nel party che sembrano fighi ma fanno cagare e alla fine dopo non  aver fatto una sega ti insultano per non parlare dei killer che facecamperano e tunnelano con build da sommelier di piselli.
Se avete 20 euro da buttare ben venga, compratelo ma altrimenti diventate come che ho 1300 ore.
